content: note a pattern which is very similar but *not* the same can be found in star book no 98 1 pattern calls for puritan mercerized crochet cotton art 40 or deluxe quality mercerized crochet cotton art 346 3 balls white 2 balls shaded yellows 1 ball kelly green any size 10 crochet thread may be substituted there are corrections to what was published in **old-time crochet fall 1982** in the ** winter 1982 2 ** edition 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/star-book-no-98-suggestions-for-fairs-and-bazaars 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/old-time-crochet-magazine-winter-1982
